analysis.description:
Poker.freeLottery (/unique_chucks/27/0x23b8e1a594b18c450852454d72a5cd20e1ba63ad.sol#237-277) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- winNo == 7

Poker.freeLottery (/unique_chucks/27/0x23b8e1a594b18c450852454d72a5cd20e1ba63ad.sol#237-277) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- winNo == 7
Poker.play (/unique_chucks/27/0x23b8e1a594b18c450852454d72a5cd20e1ba63ad.sol#147-237) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- _jpNo == 77 && jpBalance > jpMinPrize

Poker.play (/unique_chucks/27/0x23b8e1a594b18c450852454d72a5cd20e1ba63ad.sol#147-237) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- _gType == 2 && _bet.contain(_winNo % 4 + 1) (/unique_chucks/27/0x23b8e1a594b18c450852454d72a5cd20e1ba63ad.sol#177-185)
	- (_winNo > 31 && _bet.contain(2)) || (_winNo < 28 && _bet.contain(1)) (/unique_chucks/27/0x23b8e1a594b18c450852454d72a5cd20e1ba63ad.sol#161-174)
	- _winNo >= 28 && _winNo <= 31 && _bet.contain(0) (/unique_chucks/27/0x23b8e1a594b18c450852454d72a5cd20e1ba63ad.sol#167-174)
	- _jpNo == 77 && jpBalance > jpMinPrize (/unique_chucks/27/0x23b8e1a594b18c450852454d72a5cd20e1ba63ad.sol#219-227)
	- _gType == 4 && _bet.contain(_winNo) (/unique_chucks/27/0x23b8e1a594b18c450852454d72a5cd20e1ba63ad.sol#196-208)
	- _gType == 3 && _bet.contain((_winNo - 1) / 4 + 1) (/unique_chucks/27/0x23b8e1a594b18c450852454d72a5cd20e1ba63ad.sol#186-195)

Poker.freeLottery (/unique_chucks/27/0x23b8e1a594b18c450852454d72a5cd20e1ba63ad.sol#237-277) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- winNo == 7 (/unique_chucks/27/0x23b8e1a594b18c450852454d72a5cd20e1ba63ad.sol#256-271)
